semantic_identifier: [GOLD-140]: Add scoring configuration schema + persistence for issue_prioritization MVP
title: Add scoring configuration schema + persistence for issue_prioritization MVP

sections.text: Define a versioned scoring configuration model that supports weights for frequency, severity, and ARR tier, plus optional normalization settings. Implement persistence (DB table/collection) and CRUD endpoints/service methods to load the active config per workspace with sensible defaults. This unblocks subsequent work to compute and display explainable score breakdowns using a consistent, configurable source of truth.
